title: Guide to Legacy and Limited Skins Language Is In The Wrong Language

embed.description: Guide to Legacy and Limited Skins Legacy skins are any skins that were made available temporarily and then retired to the "Legacy Vault." They may be available for normal purchase again at a later date. However, all Legacy Skins above 520RP are available through Mystery Gifting.

body: If you select the page language to English (US) the language displayed is Afrikaans.

replies.body:
Hey bruno51616! 

Thanks for bringing this to our attention! We'll see what's going on here!

EDIT: This should be fixed now!
